topic.title: How zero sites were made?
topic.body:
I see the UX and the UI of the zero net sites created by the official developers have a nice look and feel.
Which framework is that?

1623969810_13pV2HA721LJK8H19qppxFrnaWqT3.body: Facebook is unhackable, at least in 2021

1623735445_1NWMPpwxp9EJJZFrhDybeZdmg48zw.body: Wow, so why do you need a leaked database, there are thousands of free data sets that you can download legally from the earth's internet

1622878208_1BVj9Z33CpeFjZejQWc7VV9E4sjYe.body:
The last time I watched TV was in the nineties,
YouTube is the new drug
